chunk:
SeSpring So Revitalizing Serum

Brand: SeSpring

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polydecene, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Paeonia Albiflora Flower Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Root Ex

mbo Nucifera Root Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Seed Extract, Niacinamide, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Astaxanthin, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Ubiquinone, Tocopherol, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Betaine, Carbomer, Caprylyl Glycol, Tromethamine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentylene Glycol, Agar, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Xanthan Gum, Pol

um, Xanthan Gum, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA.

Directions: Use daily after cleansing and toning. Apply 2-3 drops to face and massage into skin in an upward, circular motion. Can be applied morning and night. For all skin types.

Warnings: For external use o
: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Do not place in direct sunlight.
